title: A retailer marks up his goods by 20% and then offer 25% discount. What will be selling price on an item that he sells if its cost price is 2,500 Rs.? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cost price=₹2500 Marks up 20% and then offers discount @ 25% So final value=1.2*0.75=0.90 times of cost (if cost is 1 then after 20% hike value=1.2 Then on further 25% discount value=1.2*75%) So selling price=2500*0.90=₹2250
